item.title: [Adding models] please help!
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

have you logon and said
add model [id of model id]
and i think you should change the ints unless you wanna fuck up your trees(cache)
once you said add model
compile
rerun client
you overwrote trees didn’t you?

item.title: [Adding models] please help!
item.dc:creator: @Rickrolla Rickrolla
item.description:
@Rickrolla wrote:

Well people,
basiclly i have one problem.
I have copied the models and the class8 int’s into my server.
It works on every client except this one…
I love the client so please tell me an suggestion.
This is what i see:

Look my inv and how i look
The trees and stuff are spirit shields…
What to do?
this is the class8:

if(i == 9000) // ItemID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 8889; class8.anInt181 = 1670; class8.anInt190 = 336; class8.anInt198 = 64; class8.anInt204 = 97; class8.anInt169 = 3; class8.anInt194 = 37; class8.anInt165 = 8888; class8.anInt200 = 8888; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Spirit Shield"; class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a spirit shield.".getBytes(); } if(i == 9001) // ItemID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 8000; class8.anInt181 = 1670;
